short_description: roughtail brewing is a brewery based in the village, oklahoma, united states.
long_description: doing something incredible only starts with those willing to rebel against the norm. that's why our founders, blaine stansel & tony tielli, after meeting through a homebrew club, had the idea to start their own brewery. this brewery would push the limits of both style and flavor with aggressive, hop-forward beers paving the way for massive growth in oklahoma's craft beer community. we've grown a lot since back then and there's a lot more to come. our current distribution footprint covers the entire state of oklahoma, kansas as well as north texas. we've got big plans for our team, our brewery, and our ever-growing territory. it's keep the hat night! $20 and get a hat, our new sticker, and a full pour of any non barrel aged beer. in need of a cold beer. beer finder only works for the okc metro, eastern ok, and kansas. oklahoma's best brewery on memorial road. come by our taproom today.

generated_description: roughtail brewing, legally known as roughtail brewing company, based in oklahoma city, oklahoma, is a craft brewery founded in 2012 by blaine stansel and tony tielli. the company is known for its unique and hop-forward beers, which have helped to expand the craft beer community in oklahoma. initially starting in downtown oklahoma city, the brewery moved to midwest city before launching in 2013. roughtail brewing company operates a 30 bbl state-of-the-art system and distributes its beers across oklahoma, kansas, and north texas. the company offers a variety of core and seasonal beers, as well as limited releases, and operates a taproom where visitors can enjoy their products.
